title: Weakening Strike
content:
is an Action in Baldur's Gate 3. Actions can be used in both exploration and combat to maneuver across the battlefield or to harm or aid Characters. The actions that a Character can perform are based on their Class and Equipment.

Weakening Strike Information

This non-lethal attack possibly inflicts Weak Grip, hindering the target's attacks. Creatures without weapons can't have Weak Grip. 1d4+4Slashing 2 turns Type: Action Melee
